mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(username, password, realname, nickname, email, address, phone, photo, role, state, updated_at, created_at) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{realname}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{photo}, "user", "active", now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username=#{username} AND password=#{password}
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY users_id ASC) AS row, users_id, username, realname, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date FROM users WHERE state = "active"
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY users_id ASC) AS row, users_id, username, realname, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(updated_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date FROM users WHERE state = "stop"
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY users_id ASC) AS row, users_id, username, realname, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(updated_at, '%Y년 %m월 %d일')date FROM users WHERE state = "inactive"
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, photo = #{photo} WHERE users_id=#{usersId}
